school_name: Fashion Institute of Design and Merchandising
tag_professor: Gives good feedback (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Get ready to read (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  GET READY TO READ  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Dr. Greenberg is very knowledgable, one good thing is that you won\'t have to write so many papers because he divides the class into groups. Each group take turns writing papers through the semester. His lectures are a bit boring, but he tries to make them interesting. He can go off on a tangent if you encourage it. Overall he\'s pretty cool.
